TeambrbrstrongThe Harvest strongSite Reliability Engineering SREstrong Team is tasked with keeping all of our applications online and running smoothly We have wideranging responsibilities and strive empowered to have fun in the processbrbrstrongThe RolebrstrongIts an exciting time on the infrastructure front at Harvest and we are thrilled to be expanding our team by two site reliability engineers
